question: Who is the author of the book "Across the Bench - Insight into the Indian Military Judicial System"?
explanation: The book \'Across the Bench - Insight into the Indian Military Judicial System\' has been authored by Lt Gen Gyan Bhushan, former Army Commander and Member \'A\', Armed Forces Tribunal of Lucknow Bench. The book deals with military judicial system vis-a-vis command and management issues within the military establishments besides the whole gamut of issues relating to veterans, their families and dependents. It was released by Gen Bipin Rawat, Chief of Army the Staff on May 11, 2018.
